MATBase is a comprehensive Material Management and Academic Support application designed specifically for TCE students. It provides easy access to study materials, department-wise resources, semester-wise organization, and handy tools like a Grade Calculator and Calendar. Our goal is to streamline the academic experience by centralizing all necessary resources in one professional platform.
Team Leader | Full Stack Developer | App Developer
3rd Year B.Tech IT student at TCE. Leads the project development and handles both frontend and backend integrations.
3rd Year B.Tech IT student at TCE. Specializes in application architecture and database management.
3rd Year B.Tech IT student at TCE. Focuses on UI/UX design and core application logic.
